622580.name: Escape Lizards - OST
622580.description:
Lossless FLAC versions of every track contained in Escape Lizards, by the talented Sam "Hooch" Folkes!

This DLC includes the soundtrack to every world in Escape Lizards. A complete track listing follows:

  • Hooch - Escape Lizards - 01 Intro.flac
  • Hooch - Escape Lizards - 02 The Home Forest.flac
  • Hooch - Escape Lizards - 03 Human Town.flac
  • Hooch - Escape Lizards - 04 Chinatown.flac
  • Hooch - Escape Lizards - 05 Workshop.flac
  • Hooch - Escape Lizards - 06 Factory.flac
  • Hooch - Escape Lizards - 07 Desert.flac
  • Hooch - Escape Lizards - 08 Dark City.flac
  • Hooch - Escape Lizards - 09 Rusty Sewer.flac
  • Hooch - Escape Lizards - 10 Icy Plain.flac
  • Hooch - Escape Lizards - 11 The Pearly Path.flac
  • Hooch - Escape Lizards - 12 The Elysian Fields.flac
622580.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
